page.title: 03Farming in the Bodenham area
page.content: Glebe Farm is 500 years old. 2 live on the premises.He keeps cows, wheat, barley and potatoes. Upper Moor Farm, 160 acres, owned by Mr J Vaughan. 3 workers. The 7 buildings date back 400 years. He keeps cows, sheep, pigs, wheat, potatoes and oil seed rape. Houghton Court, 214 acres, owned by Mr T J Moor.2 workers. The oldest of the 7 buildings date back 500 years. He keeps sheep, wheat, barley, potatoes, grass, beet and oil seed rape. Dudales Farm, 300 acres, owned by Mr Watkins.2 workers.4 live on the premises. 9 buildings. He keeps sheep, cows, and grows wheat and barley. Lower Venn, 200 acres, owned by J R Bowen and Sons. 2 workers. 4 live on the premises. There are 15 buildings. They keep, sheep and cows, and grow corn, hay and barley.
